definition: to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)
residence/(coll.) to stay in at home/to hang around at home

sentences.english: It's surrounded on three sides by council housing estates.
sentences.chinese: 它三面都被市建住宅區圍住。

sentences.english: Much of the outer portion of this huge conglomeration of people and activities is made up of low-rise residential development.
sentences.chinese: 這座大型城市的外圍區域太多爲低層的居民住宅區。

sentences.english: It sat flush on Ninety-fifth Street in a mostly residential neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 它坐落在第九十五街一個熱鬧的住宅區。

sentences.english: It was winter, and I was in Harlem.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個冬天，我是在黑人住宅區。

sentences.english: Adapting the house structure to a narrow lot in a condominium in Londrina, Brazil was the greatest challenge of this building designed by Guilherme Torres.
sentences.chinese: 這個設計的主要挑戰是如何適應一個狹窄的住宅區。
他在住宅區租了一間公寓。

sentences.english: The grounds include two chancery buildings and a residence.
sentences.chinese: 這個使館包括兩棟獨立的建築和一個住宅區。

sentences.english: The remainder of this reclaimed land has been turned into residential subdivisions, which are among the finest in the city.
sentences.chinese: 剩下的土地被改建成市內最好的住宅區。

sentences.english: Stops along the route are candidates for new high-density housing, she says.
sentences.chinese: 輕軌沿線的停靠站將會是新建的高密度住宅區。

sentences.english: New apartment blocks and office towers are rising along the riverfront.
sentences.chinese: 新公寓住宅區和辦公大樓紛紛在河前聳立起來。

sentences.english: I have to tell you the coolest subdivision called Aerospace subdivision in Naperville.
sentences.chinese: 我還要告訴你們瑞珀市最酷的稱爲航天的住宅區。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the writer points out a mistaken trending problem in cur…
sentences.chinese: 指出當前住宅區建設中存在的錯誤傾向問題。

sentences.english: it changes really drastically from neighborhood to neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的住宅區之間差別非常大。

sentences.english: The city grew as a fruit-shipping center but is now mainly residential. Population, 38,500.
sentences.chinese: 因水果運輸而建立但是現在爲主要住宅區。

sentences.english: The new updown near close to the freeway.
sentences.chinese: 新的住宅區緊挨着高速公路。

definition: property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
